content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I must say, it's a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's quite close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. Now, how much do you propose for the rental price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for showing me the apartment, Mister Schmidt. It's a great location and very convenient. Regarding the price, I would like to propose 600 Euro per month. Is that a fair offer considering the location and amenities?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a fair offer, Maryam, but I was hoping for something a bit higher. The apartment is a great value, and its location is hard to beat. How about 800 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 800 Euro per month is quite steep. I understand the value of the location, but I'm a student and I'm looking to keep my expenses low. Would you be willing to lower the price to 700 Euro per month? This would be more in line with my budget.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your situation, Maryam, but 700 Euro per month is quite low for such a prime location. How about we meet in the middle at 750 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. 750 Euro per month is more reasonable, but I still believe it could be lower. Would you be willing to accept 725 Euro per month as a final offer? This would be my absolute maximum.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [735] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Mister Schmidt, but I can't go any higher than 725 Euro per month. If you're not willing to accept that, I'll have to look for other options.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you're not willing to meet my price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
